title: Large two bedroom in Oak Park
map_address: 726 N. Austin near Chicago Ave. and Austin
posting_body: Largo two bedroom apartment for rent in Oak Park; the rent is $1250.
The address is 726 N. Austin in Oak Park Il.
Heat is included in the rent; your only utility is electric and cooking gas.
Stove and refrigerator are also included.
Pace bus service to Maywood, Forest Park, River Forest, Broadview, Melrose park, Hillside and Chicago.
The two thing you need to pay before moving in are a security deposit and the rent.
The security deposit is one month's rent if you have good credit or one and one half month's rent if you have no credit or not-so-good credit.
Will be showing the apartment Saturday at 11:00 am.
You can contact me at (708-906-2865) if this time is not convenient or you have any questions.
Please leave a voice mail message if no answer.
